name: Daily Crypto TRIX Momentum Strategy
description: A daily-bar momentum strategy for leading cryptocurrencies that enters long trades when 14-period TRIX crosses above its 9-period signal while both lines are above zero and volume exceeds its 20-day average. Risk is managed with 3 % fixed-fraction sizing, a 5 % fixed trailing stop from entry price, and a 12 % fixed take-profit or momentum reversal exit.
